data.name: ReadCashReceipt1
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, RECEIPT_AMOUNT, CASH_RECEIPT_ID, RECEIPT_DATE, CHECK_TYPE, CHECK_NUMBER, PAYOR_ORGANIZATION, PAYOR_FIRST_NAME, PAYOR_MIDDLE_NAME, PAYOR_LAST_NAME, FRWRD_TO_NAME, FRWRD_STREET_1, FRWRD_STREET_2, FRWRD_CITY, FRWRD_STATE, FRWRD_ZIP5, FRWRD_ZIP4, FRWRD_ZIP3, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceipt2
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, RECEIPT_AMOUNT, CASH_RECEIPT_ID, RECEIPT_DATE, CHECK_TYPE, CHECK_NUMBER, PAYOR_ORGANIZATION, PAYOR_FIRST_NAME, PAYOR_MIDDLE_NAME, PAYOR_LAST_NAME, FRWRD_TO_NAME, FRWRD_STREET_1, FRWRD_STREET_2, FRWRD_CITY, FRWRD_STATE, FRWRD_ZIP5, FRWRD_ZIP4, FRWRD_ZIP3, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where CASH_RECEIPT_ID = @cashReceiptId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptEvent
data.value: select top(1) CST_IDENTIFIER, CREVENT_ID from CKT_CR_EVENT where (CREVENT_ID = @creventId) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptSourceType
data.value: select top(1) CR_SRCE_TYPE_ID, CODE from CKT_CRSRC_TYPE where CR_SRCE_TYPE_ID = @crSrceTypeId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptStatus1
data.value: select top(1) CR_STATUS_ID, CODE from CKT_CR_STATUS where CR_STATUS_ID = @crStatusId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptStatus2
data.value: select top(1) CR_STATUS_ID, CODE from CKT_CR_STATUS where CR_STATUS_ID = @crStatusId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptStatusHistory1
data.value: select top(1) CRT_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CRS_IDENTIFIER, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY, DISCONTINUE_DATE, REASON_TEXT from CKT_CR_STATUS_HIST where (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptStatusHistory2
data.value: select CRT_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CRS_IDENTIFIER, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY, DISCONTINUE_DATE, REASON_TEXT from CKT_CR_STATUS_HIST where (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) order by CREATED_TIMESTAMP desc

data.name: ReadCashReceiptType
data.value: select top(1) CRTYPE_ID, CODE from CKT_CR_TYPE where CRTYPE_ID = @crtypeId

data.name: UpdateCashReceipt
data.value: update CKT_CASH_RECEIPT set FRWRD_TO_NAME = @frwrdToName, FRWRD_STREET_1 = @frwrdStreet1, FRWRD_STREET_2 = @frwrdStreet2, FRWRD_CITY = @frwrdCity, FRWRD_STATE = @frwrdState, FRWRD_ZIP5 = @frwrdZip5, FRWRD_ZIP4 = @frwrdZip4, FRWRD_ZIP3 = @frwrdZip3, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier)
